response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. We are confident that this investment will not only provide immediate value but also contribute to long-term growth and success. Should you choose to accept this offer, we stand ready to facilitate a seamless transaction and ensure a smooth delivery process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
